metadata.name: Lasith Fernando - Mathaka Mal - මතක මල් [Official Video]
metadata.description:
Mathaka Mal (මතක මල්)  is the first music video released by Sri Lankan singer, songwriter, guitarist Lasith Fernando.

This NFT is a digital collectible minted on the Music Videos x Lasith Fernando custom smart contract.    
  
As marketplaces still do not support display of large file sizes, this music video can be accessed directly on [Arweave](https://4uuvr2nyuno7e55vile7vc2tccbly57bgj3ckzefylthmaeohpra.arweave.net/5SlY6bijXfJ3tULJ-otTEIK8d-EydiVkhcLmdgCOO-I)  
  
---  
  
Artist: Lasith Fernando  
Written & Composed by: Lasith Fernando  
Recorded at: Paragon Muzik Studio  
Mixed & Mastered by: Ravin Ratnam  
Director: Muvindu Binoy  
DOP: Hasitha Warnasooriya  
Assistant Director: Pamuditha Zen Anjana  
Production Company: ABSURDA Films  
Release Date: February 20th, 2017  

Collection: Music Videos x Lasith Fernando  
Edition: 1/1 ERC-721 token  

---


Extended Editorial License: Can be used to display privately, or in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. The License includes unlimited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder.
